subject: Sweep circuit on the scope (6V)
author: urkel23@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_4bee9.33bb6cdf.3959090e_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Been having trouble all week getting these circuits to work in the  radio.  
As you will see in the video, this circuit is working just  fine.  It must 
be something quirky in the radios themselves.   Remember, they weren't 
designed to do this.
 
_http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMXyfawWmSI_ 
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RMXyfawWmSI) 
 
-Steve H.
